job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description:
Senior Data Engineer

McLean VA

12 Months CTH


Must Have Skills:

AWS Services - Lambda

Python

Apache Spark/ PySpark

at least some Java exp. & Rest API is must

DevOps/ CI/CD/ Jenkins


JOB DESCRIPTION 

Senior Data Engineer - Jigsaw current and future roadmap primarily building automation capabilities would involve

Develop data pipelines using Apache Spark , PySpark , python , spark SQL , REST API , Postgres DB , Lambda Serverless solutions in AWS ,

hands on AWS experience , DevOps experience (YBYO).
